titleStmt.title: The true patriot's speech to the people of Rome from Sallust.
Bellum Jugurthinum. English. Selections
titleStmt.author: Sallust, 86-34 B.C.

notesStmt.note: "Contains translations of extracts from the speech of Memmius as reported in Sallust's Jugurtha. Published as a pamphlet on British politics" -- NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
